parameters.name: ActiveAddressType
parameters.description:
The new address type of the database. Valid values:

*   **Public**
*   **Private**

parameters.name: Comment
parameters.description: The new remarks of the database.

parameters.name: DatabaseId
parameters.description: The ID of the database to modify.

parameters.name: DatabaseName
parameters.description: The new name of the database.

parameters.name: DatabasePort
parameters.description: The new port of the database.

parameters.name: DatabasePrivateAddress
parameters.description: The new internal address of the database. Specify an IPv4 address or a domain name.

parameters.name: DatabasePublicAddress
parameters.description: The new public address of the database. Specify an IPv4 address or a domain name.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the bastion host that manages the database to modify.

> You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the bastion host ID.

parameters.name: NetworkDomainId
parameters.description:
The ID of the new network domain for the database.

>  You can call the [ListNetworkDomains](~~2758827~~) operation to query the network domain ID.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host that manages the database to modify.

> For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).

parameters.name: SourceInstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the ApsaraDB for RDS instance or PolarDB cluster to modify.

> This parameter is required if **Source** is set to **Rds** or **PolarDB**.
